About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a full-stack developer with expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, including Python, JavaScript (React, Redux), SQL, and PostgreSQL. With a background in microservices architecture and system design, I’ve built applications for emergency services, local communities, and small businesses. My recent projects include designing police report systems, building interactive websites, and creating social apps with fast database integration.

When I’m not coding, I’m designing custom mechanical keyboards and creating role-playing game experiences with my Dungeons & Dragons group.

I'm a big fan of my wife, my labrador, my daughter, and good people.
